flawed_nl_solution:
Half of the book means 500 / 2 = <<500/2=250>>250 pages.
Reading the first half took Jane 250 / 10 = <<250/10=52>>52 days.
Reading the second half of the book took Jane 250 / 5 = <<250/5=50>>50 days.
So in total Jane needed 52 + 50 = <<52+50=102>>102 days to read the whole book.
#### 102

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 52. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
